Title: Hand to Mouth.
Subtitle: A Chronicle of Early Failure.
Authors: Paul Auster.
Categories: Biography & Autobiography.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=qQ2qYbMGnbwC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: From the streets of Manhattan to Paris, a poignant memoir explains a series of ingenious and farfetched attempts to survive on next to no money, showing both the humor and desperation of being a "have not." Reprint. 15,000 first printing..
